mapper.sql: C.SYS_ID_TEMPLATE as id_template, C.NM_TEMPLATE as nm_template, C.PARAMETER as parameter, C.KETERANGAN as keterangan, C.F_AKTIF as f_aktif, C.SYS_USER_CREATE as user_create, C.SYS_TGL_CREATE as tgl_create, C.SYS_USER_UPDATE as user_update, C.SYS_TGL_UPDATE as tgl_update

WHERE 1=1 AND ( nm_template like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR parameter like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR keterangan like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR f_aktif like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_create like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_update like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR tgl_update like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message_template ( SYS_ID_TEMPLATE, NM_TEMPLATE, PARAMETER, KETERANGAN, F_AKTIF, SYS_USER_CREATE, SYS_TGL_CREATE, SYS_USER_UPDATE, SYS_TGL_UPDATE ) values ( #{id_template}, #{nm_template}, #{parameter}, #{keterangan}, #{f_aktif}, #{user_create}, #{tgl_create}, #{user_update}, #{tgl_update} )
